tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE recipes (
    recipe_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    ingredients TEXT[],
    instructions TEXT[],
    author_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE analytics (
    analytics_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    page_views INT,
    unique_visitors INT,
    time_spent INT,
    recipe_id INT,
    logged_in_users INT,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recipe_archive(
  recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_name TEXT,
  ingredients TEXT[],
  instructions TEXT,
  date_published DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_comments(
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recipe_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  comment TEXT,
  date_posted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    recipe_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE recipes(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    ingredients TEXT,
    instructions TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE comments(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_id INT,
    user_name VARCHAR(100),
    comment TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE analytics(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    page_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE recipes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    ingredients TEXT,
    directions TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE website_analytics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_visits INT,
    pageviews INT,
    bounce_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);
